main.public_title: A single-center randomized controlled trial for exploration of the efficacy and safety of adipose-derived mesenchymal stem cells covering the uterine cavity surface for the treatment of intrauterine adhesions
main.scientific_title: A single-center randomized controlled trial for exploration of the efficacy and safety of adipose-derived mesenchymal stem cells covering the uterine cavity surface for the treatment of intrauterine adhesions
main.i_freetext: One:Hysteroscopy, artificial cycle;Two:Hysteroscopy, adipose-derived mesenchymal stem cells;

contact.address: No.1 ShuaiFu Road, Dongcheng District, Beijing
No.1 ShuaiFu Road, Dongcheng District, Beijing

criteria.inclusion_criteria: Intrauterine adhesions is due to mainly operating history of the uterine cavity, such as abortion, myomectomy, uterine curettage and other damage caused by the occurrence of endometrial lining of the uterus.
